name: Treasure Bots
description:
Welcome to Treasure Bots Inc.

You are TIP an Exploring Unit sent to Search through an Alien Planets Cave to find the Deep Hidden Treasures.

Find your way through dangerous but beautiful Crystal caves and 
             Collect as many crystal shards as you can.




  

Controls :
E - Interact
WASD - Movement
SpaceBar - Jump
P- Pause
Special Thanks To:
Everyone at HTK and my Class

Credits:
Sounds and Music - WeLoveIndies
